442#define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_begin(id, bitmap) \
443do { \
444 assert(hwloc_bitmap_weight(bitmap) != -1); \
445 for (id = hwloc_bitmap_first(bitmap); \
446 (unsigned) id != (unsigned) -1; \
447 id = hwloc_bitmap_next(bitmap, id)) {
448
456#define hwloc_bitmap_foreach_end() \
457 } \
458} while (0)

hwloc_bitmap_weight
int hwloc_bitmap_weight(hwloc_const_bitmap_t bitmap)
Compute the "weight" of bitmap bitmap (i.e., number of indexes that are in the bitmap).
